import React, { Fragment } from 'react' import {Container, Card, Row, Col} from 'react-bootstrap'; export default class Home extends React.Component{ constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { intro: true, bkColor: '#333a40', //#333a40 img: "../assets/0.jpg" }; } componentDidMount=()=>{ setTimeout(function(){ this.setState({intro: false, bkColor: 'white'}); }.bind(this),4000); } handleImageTransition=()=>{ if(this.state.img === "../assets/0.jpg"){ this.setState({img:!this.state.img}) } } render(){ const divStyle = { backgroundColor: this.state.bkColor, position: 'fixed', padding:0, margin:0, top:0, left:0, width: '100%', height: '100%' } return(
